item.title: Let's idea, how to design travel app (12Bay) on watchOS?
item.description: Abstract Before we start to code. We should think about What is a purple of the application? Currently, We have multiple apps on macOS, iOS and ipadOS. With an app on watchOS, what needs should it meet? Find it out, and let’s design. This article talk about 12bay UI/UX on watchos This article is part of my Apple Watch by SwiftUI series. Previously : Let’s Idea, How to Design Travel App (12Bay) on WatchOS?
